text: <@U012TAH79BQ> I haven't found a work around yet. I'm in the same boat as you. I find myself switching between the file types or just creating my own hubl snippets for the .html file extensions.
Alright thx, at least we're not alone;)

Hello everyone I'm trying to move a theme from one account to another and I'm getting an error about external dependencies. I've made sure all my images are being pulled from my image file and not sure what the next step should be. I can't think of what those dependencies could be. Anyone have any ideas on what or how to look for these. Thanks

Could be a number of things, but Iâ€™d start by auditing your theme code for any use of `get_asset_url`, `get_public_template_url_by_id`, and similar functions that take a file or ID as an argument and make sure they are relative links within the project, or comment out any that require an ID that would need to be generated in the new portal.

Hello :slightly_smiling_face: I'm trying to set up my local cli to include a second project/account, but can't seem to succeed. When I run hs auth, I only get forwarded to my current account. Is there any way of modifying your config-file for more portals, or how do I go about this? Super-thankful for all answers :sunny: Thanks!
Thanks <@U26BLKGE4> I will go through again and check them.

Hi all,I'm running for the 3rd time the marketplace validation of a theme  but I don't understand why, I get this error:
---------------------
Dependency validation results:
[ERROR] Internal Error. Failed to fetch dependencies for Coded_files\js\splide.js. Please try again
[ERROR] Internal Error. Failed to fetch dependencies for Coded_files\js\splide-extension-video.js.
Please try again
-------------------
I have checked several times and the .js files are called in the various modules correctly.
Any ideas on what the problem might be?
Thanks
